title: Designed in Britain
creator_credit: Basic Films, Leon Clore and J.B. Napier-Bell
brief_description: An impression of British design ranging from furniture, textiles, kitchenware and fine china to buildings and towns. Skilfully edited with minimal commentary and a complementary 50’s soundtrack. Music by Ken Moule; photography by Larry Pizer; edited by Derek York.
creator_credit_for_label: Basic Films, Leon Clore and J.B. Napier-Bell
